title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 402.9 - Special rule for residential customers who transfer dwelling units
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 402.9 - Special rule for residential customers who transfer dwelling units

State Regulations

No steam corporation may require a deposit of a residential
customer where such customer transfers residences within such corporation's
service territory and continues service with such corporation if the
residential customer was not required to post a security deposit or had a
security deposit returned pursuant to section
117
of the

Public Service Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
402.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
